item.title: Posting Apple Watch Workouts to Strava
item.description: Until the latest release to Apple Watch seemed not to be useful to me. But with Apple Watch Series 3 and WatchOS4 several things are fixed. There is no need anymore to carry the phone during exercise and it's possible to access all training data by HealthKit. The battery should last for the usual run or short ride. I expect the watch to last at least for a 10h ride.
